Tomboy.TaskManager.Tests.TestSerialization

Tomboy.TaskManager.Tests.TestSerialization Class Reference

Tests that check tasklist serialization (writing tasklists to xml) works correctly. We usually test this by changing a note, saving it to disk and reload it to see if the changes have been successful. More...

Detailed Description

Tests that check tasklist serialization (writing tasklists to xml) works correctly. We usually test this by changing a note, saving it to disk and reload it to see if the changes have been successful.
